title: Children waiting
creator_credit: Robert Giles, Jean Wadlow, Charles Barker Films and National Playing Fields Association
brief_description: Illustrates the need for playing facilities for children who live in cities. Shows an adventure playground at Stevenage, Kent, as an example of what can be achieved through community organization and effort. Suitable for Tertiary/Teacher education.
creator_credit_for_label: Robert Giles, Jean Wadlow, Charles Barker Films and National Playing Fields Association
